/circle6 Massage the uterus to expel blood and blood clots. Blood clots trapped in the uterus will 
inhibit eff ective contractions.
/circle6 Establish an intravenous line and start an intravenous infusion of Ringer Lactate or 
normal saline. Do not use dextrose solutions unless others are unavailable.
/circle6 Add 20 IU of oxytocin to 500 ml of Ringer Lactate/normal saline that is running
